Title: Delve into the Earth
Description:
The nerubian attack, your meteoric fall...

And now Baelgrim is here?

Baelgrim needs more hands for his Coreway, but I couldn't help even if I wanted to. My people are dying as we speak. Some were abducted by the nerubians during the attack.

You're not the first outlander I've met. A small fellow, like Moira, arrived here earlier and wasted no time following the nerubians. He took the path west to a nearby cave.

I would be in your debt if you found my people.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Earthcrawl Mines delve near Freywold Village.
CompletionText: The mines were always dangerous even when the Stonebound worked them. Be careful.
RewardText: Thank you for saving my people from the nerubians.

Objectives.Text: Journey to the Earthcrawl Mines delve
Select a Combat Role for Brann Bronzebeard
Speak to Brann Bronzebeard outside the delve
